---
title: "Rendering a Quarto document for first time"
format: html
editor: visual
---

# Standard code block

```{r}
x <- 1
print(x)
log(-x)
```

# Exclude source code

```{r}
#| echo: false
x <- 2
print(x)
log(-x)
```

# Exclude output

```{r}
#| eval: false
x <- 3
print(x)
log(-x)
```

# Exclude warnings

```{r}
#| warning: false
x <- 4
print(x)
log(-4)
```

# Suppress everything

```{r}
#| include: false
x <- 5
print(x)
log(x)
```

# Add figure
This adds a figure in a quite big size

```{r}

#| out-width: "90%"
knitr::include_graphics("https://www.aquariumdomain.com/images/speciesProfiles/IndigoHamlet_cover.jpg")
```

```{r}
#This adds a figure in a scaled
#| echo: false
#| out-width: "4in"
knitr::include_graphics("https://www.aquariumdomain.com/images/speciesProfiles/IndigoHamlet_cover.jpg")
```
